members.name: load
members.doc:
Loads one or more external script checking if not already loaded previously by this function.

CKEDITOR.scriptLoader.load( '/myscript.js' );

CKEDITOR.scriptLoader.load( '/myscript.js', function( success ) {
    // Alerts true if the script has been properly loaded.
    // HTTP error 404 should return false.
    alert( success );
} );

CKEDITOR.scriptLoader.load( [ '/myscript1.js', '/myscript2.js' ], function( completed, failed ) {
    alert( 'Number of scripts loaded: ' + completed.length );
    alert( 'Number of failures: ' + failed.length );
} );

params.name: scriptUrl
params.doc: One or more URLs pointing to the scripts to be loaded.

params.name: callback
params.doc: A function to be called when the script is loaded and executed. If a string is passed to scriptUrl, a boolean parameter is passed to the callback, indicating the success of the load. If an array is passed instead, two arrays parameters are passed to the callback - the first contains the URLs that have been properly loaded and the second the failed ones.

params.name: scope
params.doc: The scope (this reference) to be used for the callback call. Defaults to CKEDITOR.

params.name: showBusy
params.doc: Changes the cursor of the document while the script is loaded.

members.short_doc:
Loads one or more external script checking if not already loaded
previously by this function. ...

members.name: queue
members.doc: Loads a script in a queue, so only one is loaded at the same time.

params.name: scriptUrl
params.doc: URL pointing to the script to be loaded.

params.name: callback
params.doc:
A function to be called when the script is loaded and executed. A boolean parameter is passed to the callback, indicating the success of the load.

@see CKEDITOR.scriptLoader.load

members.short_doc: Loads a script in a queue, so only one is loaded at the same time. ...
